issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:

fields.summary: Cluster-state must check if znode exists before getting children for storm backpressure

comments.body:
GitHub user kishorvpatil opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1181

    [STORM-1601] Check if /backpressure/storm-id node exists before requesting children

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1601

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1181.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #1181
    
----
commit 177a4c3ad269855532edc7c00312c7a79e1a4da7
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-03-03T18:32:19Z

    Check if /backpressure/storm-id before requesting children

----

GitHub user kishorvpatil opened a pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1182

    [STORM-1601] Check if /backpressure/storm-id znode  exists before requesting children

    

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/kishorvpatil/incubator-storm storm1601-1.x-branch

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1182.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #1182
    
----
commit 4fdb14a0b24ca52ad6a3f4616965e75613472452
Author: Kishor Patil <kpatil@yahoo-inc.com>
Date:   2016-03-03T18:38:01Z

    Check if /backpressure/storm-id znode  exists before requesting children

----

Github user hustfxj commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1182#issuecomment-192108715
  
    +1

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1181#issuecomment-192318678
  
    +1

Github user revans2 commented on the pull request:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1182#issuecomment-192324639
  
    +1

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1181

Github user asfgit closed the pull request at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/1182

Thanks [~kishorvpatil],

I merged this into master and 1.x-branch
